doc.dc_title_s: McGregor 000003020 - 1747 (copy 1) - A survey of the Northern Neck of Virginia, being the lands belonging to the Rt. Honourable Thomas Lord Fairfax Baron Cameron, bounded by & within the Bay of Chesapoyocke and between the rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack: With the courses of the rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack, in Virginia, as surveyed according to order in the years 1736 & 1737.
doc.dc_description_s:
* Title: A survey of the Northern Neck of Virginia, being the lands belonging to the Rt. Honourable Thomas Lord Fairfax Baron Cameron, bounded by & within the Bay of Chesapoyocke and between the rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack: With the courses of the rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack, in Virginia, as surveyed according to order in the years 1736 & 1737.

* Credit: Area Table 755-2 1747 Warner copy 1
* Relief shown pictorially.
 * Stephenson and McKee attribute this map to John Warner.

* SPECIAL COLLECTIONS. Copy 1: Hand colored, and annotated to show additional roads, plantations, counties and towns.
